text: @HillaryClinton @JJohnsonLaw And the Red Dawn e-mails indicated our scientists in government and academia knew we had to shutdown around February 18th.  The President didn’t want to hear it. We didn’t shut down until mid-March. https://t.co/3gJI3iWxXO
